Pledges.description: Thank you. You are a wonderful person. Help make this a reality and get exclusive updates and announcements.
FIRST MOVER ADVANTAGE - BLACK and OPTIC GREEN. Add $5 shipping for US, $10 for Canada, and $20 for other international.
FIRST MOVER ADVANTAGE - BLACK and OLYMPIAN BLUE. Add $5 shipping for US, $10 for Canada, and $20 for other international.
FIRST MOVER ADVANTAGE - BLACK and OLYMPIAN BLUE with "QR" DIGITAL CAMOUFLAGE. Add $5 shipping for US, $10 for Canada, and $20 for other international.
FIRST MOVER ADVANTAGE - BLACK and TANGERINE. Add $5 shipping for US, $10 for Canada, and $20 for other international.

FAST FOLLOWER (Ships Nov)  - Pick any one Meta Watch Strata: Black with Tangerine, Olympian Blue, Optic Green, or Olympian Blue with "QR" Digital Camouflage.  Add $5 shipping for US, $10 for Canada, and $20 for other international.

**NEW COLOR - STEALTH Black (Ships Nov) - Introduced due to popular demand by ninjas. Even the steel parts are Ion Plated to a durable black finish. Add $5 shipping for US, $10 for Canada, and $20 for other international.

FIRMWARE HACKER (Ships Sept) -  An Olympian Blue Strata watch, that also comes with a JTAG in-circuit debugging tool in addition to the standard charger. If you don't know what JTAG is, this one is not for you. Add $5 shipping for US, $10 for Canada, and $20 for other international.

FIRMWARE HACKER, NOT BLUE! (Ships Sept) - Added by special request, pick any Strata that is NOT Olympian Blue: Choose from Black with Tangerine, Optic Green, or Olympian Blue with "QR" Digital Camouflage. It will also come with a JTAG in-circuit debugging tool in addition to the standard charger. If you don't know what JTAG is, this one is not for you. Add $5 shipping for US, $10 for Canada, and $20 for other international.

*** SUSAN KARE SIGNATURE MODEL, NUMBERED LIMITED EDITION *** (Ships Nov) Loving care from Kare herself. Custom designed watch prints & watch faces. Signed and numbered. Susan Kare began her career at Apple, Inc. as the screen graphics and digital font designer for the original Macintosh computer. According to the Museum of Modern Art in New York, Susan Kare is "a pioneering and influential computer iconographer. Since 1983, Kare has designed thousands of icons for the world's leading software companies. Utilizing a minimalist grid of pixels and constructed with mosaic-like precision, her icons communicate their function immediately and memorably, with wit and style."
